Song.title: Rejoice
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Todd Twining © 2006 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| G | Am | F C/E | Dsus4 D | G | Am | F Dm Gsus4 G |] [| C F2 | Gsus4 G | C F2 | Gsus4 G |]
Verse 1: All the [F]earth re[C]joice, your Cre[F/A]a[G/B]tor [C]reigns As the [F]only [C]awesome [Gsus4 G]God The [C/E]Alpha [F] and the O[G]me[Am]ga Who [F]was, [Dm]is, and [Gsus4 G]is [ ]to [Csus4 C]come Let the [G]oceans roar and the [Am]mountains sing He pro[F2]vides for [C/E]all He has [Dsus4 D]made So be [G]comforted as He [Am]rules with grace Re[F]joice, [Dm]all the [Gsus4 G]earth, [ ]re[C F2 | Gsus4 G | C C/E F2 | Gsus4 G |]joice
Verse 2: All the [F]world re[C]joice, for the [F/A]ba[G/B]by [C]comes As a [F]humble [C]prince in the [Gsus4 G]night The [C/E]Word made [F]flesh, Em[G]manu[Am]el The [F]Ev[Dm]er[Gsus4]last[G]-ing [Csus4 C]Light Let the [G]warmth of heaven{,} reach the [Am]coldest heart With the [F2]gospel [C/E]of His [Dsus4 D]grace For His [G]heel will bruise the [Am]serpent’s head Re[F]joice, [Dm]all the [Gsus4 G]world, [ ]re[C F2 | Gsus4 G | D D/F# G2 | Asus A |]joice
{new_page} {key:D} Verse 3: All the [G]church re[D]joice, for your [G/B]King [A]re[D]turns On a [G]white horse [D]wearing a [Asus4 A]crown He will [D/F#]break the [G]sky{,} with the [A/E]an[A/C#]-gel’s [Bm]shout Des[Em7]cending [Asus4]from the [Dsus4 D]clouds Then the [A]dead will rise{,} from the [Bm]land and sea All His [G]people [D/F#]will as[Esus4 E/G#]cend We will [A]reign with Him for e[Bm]ternity Re[G]joice, [Em7]all the [Asus4 A]church, [ ]re[D]joice Then the [A]dead will rise{,} from the [Bm]land and sea All His [G]people [D/F#]will as[Esus4 E/G#]cend We will [A]reign with Him for e[Bm]ternity Re[G]joice, [Em7]all the [Asus A]church, r[| D D/F# G2 | Asus4 A |]ejoice Re[E E/G# A2 | Bsus4 ]joice, [ B]oh, r[| E E/G# A2 | Bsus4 B | E]ejoice
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 all the earth rejoice your creator reigns as the only awesome god the alpha and the omega who was is and is to come let the oceans roar and the mountains sing he provides for all he has made so be comforted as he rules with grace rejoice all the earth rejoice verse 2 all the world rejoice for the baby comes as a humble prince in the night the word made flesh emmanuel the everlasting light let the warmth of heaven reach the coldest heart with the gospel of his grace for his heel will bruise the serpents head rejoice all the world rejoice verse 3 all the church rejoice for your king returns on a white horse wearing a crown he will break the sky with the angels shout descending from the clouds then the dead will rise from the land and sea all his people will ascend we will reign with him for eternity rejoice all the church rejoice then the dead will rise from the land and sea all his people will ascend we will reign with him for eternity rejoice all the church rejoice rejoice oh rejoice
